name: Optical Cable Corporation
description: Optical Cable Corporation (OCC) is a leading manufacturer and provider of fiber optic and copper communications cable products. Founded in 1983 and headquartered in Roanoke, Virginia, OCC has established itself as a reliable supplier in the telecommunications industry. The company specializes in designing and producing high-performance fiber optic cables, copper cables, and connectivity solutions for various applications, including data centers, telecommunications, and industrial networks. OCC's commitment to quality and innovation is reflected in its extensive product portfolio, which includes indoor and outdoor cable systems, as well as specialty cables for harsh environments. With a focus on customer service and technical support, OCC works closely with clients to develop tailored solutions that meet their specific needs. The company also emphasizes sustainability in its operations, implementing environmentally friendly practices in manufacturing and product design. As the demand for high-speed internet and advanced communication technologies continues to grow, OCC is strategically positioned to capitalize on market trends and expand its footprint in the global telecommunications landscape.
